hero.title: Koya's
hero.subtitle: Homemade food, tapas, toasts and delicious desserts — all prepared with care. A relaxed, family atmosphere where everyone is welcome.

about.label: Our Story
about.title: Made With Love, Every Day
about.paragraph1: Koya's is your go-to spot in Carcavelos — a café, bar, and bistro all in one, right in the heart of Mercado de Carcavelos, next to Santini. Whether you're stopping by for your morning coffee, a long lunch, or drinks with friends after a day at the beach, we've got you covered.
about.paragraph2: We're known for our wood-fired pizzas (excellent even by Napolitano standards, our regulars say), our wraps, bruschetta, and homemade soups. Everything is made fresh, with care, and with flavors that feel like home.
about.paragraph3: With 6–8 craft beers on tap, signature cocktails made with Sharish gin, and a relaxed outdoor terrace, Koya's is the kind of place where you come for a quick bite and end up staying all evening. Open every day from 9 AM to midnight.
